text:
@WhiteHouse Shouldn't the White House call these:

DEAD: Press Briefing with Coronavirus Task Force ??

We are on our way to a MILLION cases USA and very soon 50,000+ deaths USA. Individual-1, It's RISING!

Confirmed Cases USA 04/21/2020
852,703

Confirmed Deaths USA 04/21/2020
Deaths
47,750
